  • TYPE: Bath Mats

Introducing our new terry bath mats which are part of our hotel bath linen collection. Made from a 100% cotton Turkish terry which is exceedingly thick and absorbent. Sculpted in a variation of the classic "Check" hotel towel. Turkey has been renowned for weaving the finest terry towels for centuries and these are among the best of the best. Why does Turkey weave the finest terry? It truly is the best!
